SENT.plain: KCNJ11 polymorphisms have been linked to the risk of developing type 2 diabetes
Our aim was to define the contribution of KCNJ11 to new-onset diabetes after transplantation (NODAT) among patients treated with Tacrolimus (Tac)
A total of 115 NODAT and 205 non-NODAT were genotyped for rs5219 (p.E23K)
AA+AG genotypes were significantly associated with NODAT-risk (p=0.004; OR=2.10)
The reported effect of this KCNJ11 polymorphism on insulin release by beta cells could explain this association
